title: Smoky Potato Poblano Soup with Optional Bacon

instructions.default: Heat gently in a saucepan, stirring.
instructions.Frozen Pint: Defrost or run under warm water to slide out. Heat gently in a saucepan, stirring.
instructions.Frozen Pint / Vegan: Defrost or run under warm water to slide out. Heat gently in a saucepan, stirring.
instructions.Frozen Pint / Bacon: Defrost or run under warm water to slide out. Heat gently in a saucepan, stirring.
